title: Laying Down the Law!
itunes:title: Laying Down the Law!
description: Today on The Cigar Authority, Dave Garofalo, Mr Jonathan and Chuck Morrison lay down the law with Frank herrara from La caridad Del Cobre.  Later in the show Mr Jonathan "gets promoted" back into the producer chair and Chuck Morrison makes his Cigar Authority hosting debut as we smoke the La Reloba Sumatra Torpedo.  It's time for the finer things in life... It's time for The Cigar Authority!
